name: SuperstarFighter - pre-alpha release
description:
Alpha-release for playtest.  Release for #devtober.

A fast arena game for 2 to 4 players, in which ships can't stop and fire bombs from their back.

You can play with keyboard or joypads.

KB1:

ARROW KEYS -> turn left or right
M -> Fire
N -> Cancel

KB2:

WASD -> turn left or right
1 -> Fire
Tab -> Cancel

JOYPAD:

Left stick -> turn left or right
X  -> Fire
O -> Cancel

Credits:

Music:
menu theme: by frankum - electronic-base-and-pop-guitar
battlefield theme: foolboymedia - rave digger
